name: Body Applicator Wrap
description:
A non-woven cloth wrap that is infused with a powerful botanically-based formula to deliver maximum tightening. toning, and firming results in as little as 45 minutes! It continuously hydrates for firmer, smoother, more youthful-looking skin, and reduces the appearance of cellulite and skin slackening. 

*Naturally-based, detoxifying body contouring formula
*Tighten, tone and firm
*minimize cellulite appearance
*Instant results in as little as 45 minutes
*Progressive results over 72 hours

name: Facial Wrap Applicator
description:
a cream-infused cloth wrap to tighten, tone, and firm the skin for the appearance of a more youthful face in just 45 minutes. Your face will look softer, smoother, and revitalized. The facial applicator also continuously hydrates for fresher, more luminous skin and a younger looking you.  

*Lifts and rejuvenates
*Firms and invigorates skin
*Softens fine lines and wrinkles
*Deeply hydrates to smooth and revitalize

name: Fat Fighters
description:
Have a sweet tooth? A carb craving? It's okay to indulge every once in a while when you have Advance Formula Fat Fighters with Carb Inhibitors. 
*Blocks some of the fat and carbs from meals.
*Designed to be taken up to an hour after meals.
*Cactus-based formula.
*Does not contain shellfish.
*Gluten free.

name: Stretch Mark & Moisturizing Body Cream
description:
Rejuvenating body cream
*Non-greasy, naturally-based formula
*minimizes the appearance of stretch marks or other scars
*promotes youthful looking skin
*promotes even skin tone

name: Defining Gel
description:
An intensive body contouring gel that hydrates the skin, reduces the appearance of cellulite, varicose veins, and scars. Also clears up psoriasis, and firms areas such as the abdomen, back, legs, and upper arms.  

*Minimizes cellulite appearance
*Diminishes appearance of varicose veins
*Softens and hydrates
*Improves skin texture and tightness
*Reduces appearance of marks and scars
